parameters: This bell reminds you of the servant bell from home.

The crystal has a bug where if you save, quit, load, and do an attunement reset you will lose your frozen flowers.
So I'm here as a failsafe. Talk to me if you want some frozen flowers, and no, you can't have the one on my head.
Can you give me 2 Frozen Flower ?
Can you give me 2 Frozen Flower ?
Can you give me 2 Frozen Flower ?
Can you give me that Dev Cache behind you?
Can you give me 2 Frozen Flower ?
Can you give me that Dev Cache behind you?
Sure. I'll bring it in bounds. Alot of these items need another pass. So don't get all mouthy about descriptions or whatever.
Can you give me 2 Frozen Flower ?
Can you give me 2 Frozen Flower ?
The newly hatched harpy sniffs you.
Their eyes make for great magical magnification!
I'm not going to let you do that, Lussuria.
Looks like this one is expecting something from her new Mother.
Guess I'm supposed to feed it but I don't know what.
Aww, does this make me an Auntie now?
Actually that makes me sound old.
Weren't you Jarles Windram's little prodige back home?
What were all those legendary hunter teachings for if you don't know what harpies eat?
I know what they eat, I just don't know what the hatchlings eat.
That one is pretty big for a hatchling. Just give it some fruit or something.
I guess I can feed it anything really.
Are you going to pre chew it? I need to see this.
No but I'll transport some fish.
Dangle the fish over the hatchling.
Dangle the fish over the hatchling.
Aww I was hoping to see some maternal avering.
Well, I guess it's back to work.
I can't wait to tell Lilly about this.
Never thought I would hatch a harpy egg out here...
The Harpy grows excited and widely opens its mouth!
I've never been simultaneously disgusted and amused before!
Wait until Lilly hears about this one!
Don't you have a barrier to go figure out.
Yes, yes, of course dear sister. I'll get right back on that.
You could hear Lussuria's laugh growing distant as she walks away.
